meanings.definition: A fixed sum of money paid to someone each year, typically for the rest of their life.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother receives an annuity from the government every month.
meanings.sent2: The annuity helped ensure financial stability for retirees.
meanings.sent3: The annuity was like a reliable friend, always showing up on time.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an annuity of joy that brightened everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The annuity was a steady stream of income that never faltered.

meanings.definition: A form of investment that provides a series of payments at specified intervals.
meanings.sent1: Investing in an annuity can offer a secure way to receive regular payments.
meanings.sent2: The annuity paid out dividends quarterly to the investors.
meanings.sent3: The annuity investment was like planting seeds that grew into a money tree.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom was an annuity of knowledge that enriched those around her.
meanings.sent5: The annuity was a financial lifeline that kept the business afloat during tough times.
